item.title: Mac OS Setup
item.description: Setting up vim " You need to import default vim settings first, e.g. syntax highlighting, etc.source $VIMRUNTIME/defaults.vi" Set non visual mode when mouse is dragging on vimset mouse-=a" set 1 tab == 4 spaces..filetype plugin indent on" show existing tab with 4 spaces widthset tabstop=4" when indenting with '>', use 4 spaces widthset shiftwidth=4" On pressing tab, insert 4 spacesset expandtabrun .bashrc at .bash_profile time if [ -f $HOME/.bashrc ]; then source $HOME/.
